data.comment: Today's referee, Alexandre Boucaut, has blown to start the match.
Goal! Geoffry Hairemans gives Mechelen a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 27, That's a fine assist from Rob Schoofs.
Siemen Voet (Mechelen) sees red and is sent off in Mechelen!
Wouter Vrancken (Mechelen) is making a first substitution, with Issa Kabore replacing Nikola Storm.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Goal! Daan Heymans levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 47, Serge Leuko with an assist there.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Aboubakary Koita.
Great play from Daan Heymans to set up the goal.
In the minute 51, Steven Defour is replacing Onur Kaya for the home team.
Kerim Mrabti gets an equalizer for Mechelen. The score is now 2-2.
Issa Kabore instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 62, The home team replace Rob Schoofs with William Togui.
Goal! Waasland-Beveren have got their heads in front thanks to a Leonardo Bertone strike.
Nicky Hayen is making the team's first substitution at AFAS Stadion with Jordan Faucher replacing Michael Frey.
In the minute 87, Andrija Vukcevic is replacing Aboubakary Koita for Waasland-Beveren at AFAS Stadion.
It's 2-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
The away team have replaced Daan Heymans with Jur Schryvers. This is the third substitution made today by Nicky Hayen.
